verses.roman:
'uttare' khudile āche kṛṣṇa 'ajagare'
dhana nāhi pābe, khudite gilibe sabāre

synonyms: uttare—on the northern side; khudile—if you dig; āche—there is; kṛṣṇa—black; ajagare—snake; dhana—treasure; nāhi—not; pābe—you will get; khudite—digging; gilibe—will devour; sabāre—everyone.
translation: " 'If you dig on the northern side, there is a big black snake that will devour you if you attempt to dig up the treasure.
